mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cm_board(cm_group, depth, step, cm_writer, cm_title, cm_content) VALUES(#{cm_group}, #{depth}, #{step}, #{cm_writer}, #{cm_title}, #{cm_content})
mapper.select: SELECT cm_no, cm_group, depth, step, cm_writer, cm_content, reg_date FROM cm_board WHERE depth != 1 AND status = 'Y' AND cm_group = #{cm_no} ORDER BY reg_date ASC
SELECT * FROM cm_board WHERE cm_no = #{cm_no} AND depth = 1 AND status = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( select a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reg_date DESC) AS rn from cm_board a where depth = 1
